    BitBoard
    TODO make program go for quickest chess, otherwise sometimes game does not terminate this just means you teach him the three moves repeated give you draw
    BitChecker Deprecated
    BitMoveEngine
    Engine that uses the BitPatterns class to generate real chess moves in BitMap notation should be able to run concurrently
    BitMoveEngine.BishopEngine
    Generates heuristic move templates for Bishop moves.
    BitMoveEngine.BPawnEngine
    Generates heuristic template for Black Pawns
    BitMoveEngine.KingEngine
    Generates Heuristic move templates for Kings.
    BitMoveEngine.KnightEngine
    Generates heuristic move template for Knight moves.
    BitMoveEngine.QueenEngine
    Generates heuristic move templates for Queen moves.
    BitMoveEngine.RookEngine
    Generates heuristic move templates for Rook moves.
    BitMoveEngine.WPawnEngine
    Generates heuristic move template for White Pawns
    BitPatterns
    Houses utility methods and read-only templates for generating arbitrary bit patterns.
    BitTranslator
    Translates from Map to Bit Array representation.
    CachedLengthBitBoard Deprecated
    WeightedCount
    assumes White is maximizer and Black is minimizer
